gurmukhi: FFMkMq FolM ] bbMkMq bolM ] auCMkMq qwjI ] gjMkMq gwjI ]189]
transliteration: Dhadhankant Dholan|| Babankant Bolan|| Ouchhankant Taajee|| Gadankant Gadjee||189||
translation: The drums sounded, the horses swung and the warriors thundered.189.

gurmukhi: CutMkMq qIrM ] bbMkMq bIrM ] FlMkMq FwlM ] auTMkMq qwlM ]190]
transliteration: Chhoutankant Tderan|| Babankant Bderan|| Dhalankant Dhaalan|| Outhankant Taalan||190||
translation: The thundering warriors discharged arrows, their shields were raised and the rhythmic sound was heard.190.

gurmukhi: iKmMkMq K`gM ] DDMkMq D`gM ] CutMkMq nwlM ] auTMkMq j√çwlM ]191]
transliteration: Khimankant Khadganng|| Dhadhankant Dhaggadg|| Chhoutankant Naalan|| Outhankant Juaalan||191||
translation: The daggers glistened, the flaming fires blazed and the flames rose high.191.

gurmukhi: bhMqMq GwXM ] JlMkMq cwXM ] ifgMqMq bIrM ] iBgMqMq BIrM ]192]
transliteration: Bahantant Ghaayan|| Jhalankant Chaayan|| Digadtant Bderan|| Bhigadtant Bhderan||192||
translation: The blood oozed out from the wounds, which demonstrated the zeal of the warriors; they ran and fell in the multitude.192.

gurmukhi: tutMdMq KolM ] FmMkMq FolM ] tutMkMq qwlM ] ncMqMq bwlM ]193]
transliteration: Toutandant Dholan|| Dhamanndant Dhaggadg|| Toutankant Taalan|| Nachanndant Baalan||193||
translation: The helmets broke, the drums sounded and the heavenly damsels danced in consonance with the tune.193.

gurmukhi: igrMqMq AMgM ] ktMqMq jMgM ] clMqMq qIrM ] BtMkMq BIrM ]194]
transliteration: Girantant Anadg||katantant Janadg|| Chalantant Tderan|| Bhatankant Bhiran||194||
translation: The limbs were chopped, they fell down and because of the discharged arrows, the warriors were tossed about violently.194.

gurmukhi: juJMqMq vIrM ] BjMqMq BIrM ] krMqMq kRohM ] BrMqMq rohM ]195]
transliteration: Jujhantant Vderan|| Bhajantant Bhderan|| Karantant Krihan|| Bharantant Rohan||195||
translation: The warriors fought bravely and the cowards ran away; the heroic fighters were filled with anger and malice.195.

gurmukhi: qjMqMq qIrM ] BjMqMq BIrM ] bhMqMq GwXM ] JlMqMq jwXM ]196]
transliteration: Tajantant Tderan|| Bhajantant Bhderan|| Bahantant Ghaayaan|| Jhalantant Jaayan||196||
translation: With the discharge of the arrows, the cowards ran away and the zeal was exhibited by the oozing wounds.196.

gurmukhi: qqMkMq AMgM ] jutMkMq jMgM ] aulMQMq luQM ] plMQq ju`QM ]197]
transliteration: Tatankant Anadg|| Joutankant Janadg|| Ulanthant Louthan|| Palanthant Jouthan||197||
translation: The limbs and corpses of the warriors engaged in war fell up and down.197.

gurmukhi: FlMkMq FwlM ] puAMqMq mwlM ] ncMqMq eIsM ] ktMqMq sIsM ]198]
transliteration: Dhalankant Dhaalan|| Puantant Maalan|| Nachanndant Eesan|| Katantant Seesan||198||
translation: The shields gleamed and seeing the chopped heads, Shiva began to dance and wear the rosaries of skulls.198.

gurmukhi: auCMkMq qwjI ] bhMqMq gwjI ] lutMqMq lu`QM ] ktMqMq mu`KM ]199]
transliteration: Ouchhankant Taajee|| Bahantant Gadjee|| Loutantant Louthan|| Katantant Moukkhan||199||
translation: The horses sprang and the warriors seeing the corpses and chopped heads got pleased.199.

gurmukhi: qpMqMq qygM ] cmMkMq bygM ] ncy muMf mwlI ] hsy q`qkwlI ]200]
transliteration: Tapantant Tegadg|| Chamanndant Begadg|| Nache Mounnd Maalee|| Hase Tattkaalee||200||
translation: The swords saturated with hot blood glistened and Shiva danced and laughed.200.

gurmukhi: jutMqMq vIrM ] CutMqMq qIrM ] brMqMq bwlM ] FlMqMq FwlM ]201]
transliteration: Joutantant Vderan|| Chhoutantant Tderan|| Barantant Baalan|| Dhalantant Dhaalan||201||
translation: The warriors, getting together, began to discharge arrows and taking their gleaming shields they began to wed the heavenly damsels.201.

gurmukhi: sumMqMq m`dM ] auTY s`d g`dM ] ktMqMq AMgM ] igrqMq jMgM ]202]
transliteration: Soumantant Maddan|| Outhai Sadd Gaddan|| Katantant Anadg|| Girtant Janadg||202||
translation: The intoxicated sound is rising from all the four sides and the chopped limbs are falling down in the battlefield.202.
